title: Front Door routing latency between regions
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Improper health probe configuration caused delayed failover during regional latency spikes
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer observed longer response times when Region 1 experienced high load
msdfm_resolution: Updated health probe intervals and configured Front Door with performance-based routing

title: Web App authentication failures with Entra ID
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Misconfigured app registration redirect URIs caused authentication loop errors
msdfm_customerstatement: Users unable to log in to the web application intermittently
msdfm_resolution: Corrected redirect URIs and verified token issuance policy synchronization

title: SQL replication lag across regions
msdfm_rootcausedescription: High transaction volume exceeded replication throughput between Region 1 and Region 2
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer noticed stale data in failover region
msdfm_resolution: Enabled readable secondaries and optimized replication topology with auto-failover group

title: App Configuration update delay across regions
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Global endpoint not properly synchronized, leading to version mismatches between regions
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer reported inconsistent feature flag states across web apps
msdfm_resolution: Implemented distributed cache sync and used regional replica endpoints

title: Key Vault access denied during rotation
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Identity-based access control misalignment after key rotation
msdfm_customerstatement: Applications failed to retrieve secrets during deployment pipeline execution
msdfm_resolution: Synchronized managed identities and verified key versioning with continuous access evaluation

title: Redis connection timeout under peak load
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Connection pool exhaustion due to under-provisioned tier and high concurrent requests
msdfm_customerstatement: Web API response times increased significantly under load test
msdfm_resolution: Upgraded Redis tier and implemented connection multiplexing in backend services

title: Application Insights ingestion limit reached
msdfm_rootcausedescription: High telemetry volume from both regions exceeded daily ingestion quota
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer reported missing logs and incomplete performance traces
msdfm_resolution: Increased ingestion quota and added adaptive sampling policy in SDK configuration

title: Private endpoint DNS resolution failure
msdfm_rootcausedescription: DNS zone not linked correctly to VNet, breaking private endpoint resolution
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer unable to connect to SQL and Storage through private endpoints
msdfm_resolution: Linked DNS zones to both VNets and verified record propagation across regions

title: Application Gateway certificate mismatch
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Expired certificate in Key Vault was not updated on gateway listener
msdfm_customerstatement: Users encountered SSL/TLS errors when accessing regional endpoints
msdfm_resolution: Renewed certificates and automated Key Vault secret synchronization with gateway

title: Cross-region Redis cache data inconsistency
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Geo-replication failed due to link bandwidth constraints during large key transfers
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer observed stale cache entries after region failover test
msdfm_resolution: Enabled persistence and reconfigured geo-replication with increased bandwidth allocation
